recipe.title: Pickled Baby Squash
instructions: Thinly slice squash into coins. Place squash, 3 dill sprigs, and garlic in a 1-quart jar. Bring vinegar, peppercorns, salt, sugar, remaining 3 dill sprigs, and 1 cup water to a boil in a small saucepan, stirring to dissolve salt and sugar. Pour into jar with squash mixture. Cover, let cool slightly, and chill. Serve within 2 weeks.
